field.label: Title
field.hint: On the front page, the first page or in the Executive Summary (if any) of the document, what is it called? 150 characters or fewer.
field.required: You must enter a main title for this item.

field.label: Sub-Title
field.hint: The remainder of the document's title, if any. 150 characters of fewer.

field.label: Agency
field.hint: What agency is the primary creator of this document?

field.label: Additional Creator(s)
field.hint: What other agencies, consultants, or authors, if any, contributed to the creation of this document?

field.label: Subjects(s)
field.hint: Select what subjects you feel are the most relevant subjects covered in this report. Pick up to three.
field.required: You must select at least one subject

field.label: Description
field.hint: A brief (100-200 characters) explanation of the contents of this document.
field.required: You must provide a description about this submission

field.label: Date Published
field.hint: This document's date of publication by agency.
field.required: You must enter at least the year.

field.label: Report Type
field.hint: Use the dropdown for a list of the most common kinds of reports and pick the one closest to what you are submitting.

field.label: Source
field.hint: The source of this publication

field.label: Language
field.hint: If the publication is written in a language other than English, pick the language from the dropdown list. English is the default choice.

field.label: Associated Year - Fiscal
field.hint: The fiscal year covered by this publication. If multiple fiscal years are covered, select "Add more" to add additional years. One of either Associated Year - Fiscal or Associated Year - Calender is required.

field.label: Associated Year - Calender
field.hint: The calender year covered by this publication. If multiple calender years are covered, select "Add more" to add additional years. One of either Associated Year - Calender or Associated Year - Fiscal is required.

field.label: Associated Place (Other)
field.hint: The place associated with this publication. Required if applicable.

field.label: Associated Neighborhood
field.hint: The neighborhood associated with this publication. Required if applicable.

field.label: Associated Borough(s)
field.hint: The borough associated with this publication. Required if applicable.

field.label: Associated School District(s)
field.hint: The school district(s) associated with this publication. Required if applicable.

field.label: Associated Community Board District(s)
field.hint: The community board district(s) associated with this publication. Required if applicable.

field.label: Number of Pages
field.hint: How many pages are in this document?
field.required: You must enter the number of pages in the document.

field.label: Subject Keywords
field.hint: Enter appropriate subject keywords or phrases.

field.label: Abstract
field.hint: Enter the abstract of the item.

field.label: Sponsors
field.hint: Enter the names of any sponsors and/or funding codes in the box.

field.label: Description
field.hint: Enter any other description or comments in this box.

field.label: One: Authors
field.hint: Enter the names of the authors of this item.
